format_neutral.3_4#: Format neutral cite where the page must be 3 or 4 digits, like '2000-NMSC-123'

louisiana.#: Format neutral Louisiana cite, like '2009 1359R (La.App. 1 Cir. 05/10/10)'

paragraph.#: Citation to a paragraph instead of a volume, like 'Bankr. L. Rep. ¶12,345'
paragraph.with_suffix#: Paragraph cite with optional alpha character appended

page.3_4#: Page number that must be 3 or 4 digits long
page.with_commas#: Page number that allows internal commas, like '12,345,678'. Doesn't enforce 3-digit groups.
page.with_commas_and_suffix#: Page number that allows internal commas, plus optional alpha character appended
page.with_commas_or_periods#: Page number that allows internal punctuation
page.with_periods#: Page number that allows internal periods, like '1234.56'

volume.with_alpha_suffix#: Volume number that may have 'A' appended, like '1A'
volume.with_digit_suffix#: Volume number that may have digits appended, like '123-4'
volume.year#: Volume number that must be a year between 1900 and 2099
